001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.io.InputStream;
004
005import org.nasdanika.common.Converter;
006import org.nasdanika.common.DefaultConverter;
007import org.nasdanika.common.Function;
008import org.nasdanika.common.FunctionFactory;
009import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
010import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
011import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
012
013public class TypedSupplierFactoryAttribute<T> extends AbstractFeatureDelegate<SupplierFactoryFeature<?>> implements SupplierFactoryFeature<T> {
014
015        private boolean interpolate;
016        private Class<T> type;
017        private Function<Object, T> converter;
018
019        public TypedSupplierFactoryAttribute(Class<T> type, SupplierFactoryFeature<?> delegate, boolean interpolate, Function<Object,T> converter) {
020                super(delegate);
021                this.type = type;
022                this.interpolate = interpolate;
023                this.converter = converter;
024        }
025
026        public TypedSupplierFactoryAttribute(Class<T> type, Feature<?> delegate, boolean interpolate, Function<Object,T> converter) {
027                this(type, interpolate ? new InputStreamSupplierFactoryAttribute(delegate) : new DelegatingSupplierFactoryFeature<>(delegate), interpolate, converter);
028        }
029
030        @Override
031        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
032        public SupplierFactory<T> getValue() {
033                if (!delegate.isLoaded()) {
034                        return SupplierFactory.from(null, "Null from not loaded feature " + getKey()); 
035                }
036                
037                FunctionFactory<Object,T> converter = context -> {
038                        return new Function<Object, T>() {
039
040                                @Override
041                                public double size() {
042                                        return 1;
043                                }
044
045                                @Override
046                                public String name() {
047                                        return "Converting String to " + type;
048                                }
049
050                                @Override
051                                public T execute(Object obj, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {                                 
052                                        if (TypedSupplierFactoryAttribute.this.converter != null) {
053                                                return TypedSupplierFactoryAttribute.this.converter.apply(obj, progressMonitor);
054                                        }
055                                        
056                                        if (obj == null) {
057                                                return null;
058                                        }
059                                        
060                                        if (type.isInstance(obj)) {
061                                                return (T) obj;
062                                        }
063                                        
064                                        Converter converter = context.get(Converter.class, DefaultConverter.INSTANCE);
065                                        T ret = converter.convert(obj, type);
066                                        if (ret == null) {
067                                                throw new ConfigurationException("Cannot convert " + obj + " to " + type, TypedSupplierFactoryAttribute.this);
068                                        }
069                                        return ret;
070                                }
071                        };
072                        
073                };              
074                
075                if (interpolate) {                              
076                        SupplierFactory<String> ssf = ((SupplierFactory<InputStream>) delegate.getValue()).then(Util.TO_STRING);                                                                        
077                        return (interpolate ? ssf.then(Util.INTERPOLATE_TO_STRING) : ssf).then(converter);
078                }
079                
080                return delegate.getValue().then(converter);             
081        }
082
083}
